file_content.text: We can take it from here. There's an outpost not far.
We appreciate the rescue. Use that report in good conscience.
We must protect the Moff.
Halt right there!
I'm on your side. I'm here to see Moff Zamar.
And I am sworn to protect him. State your purpose.
You're about to be overrun by Republic troops. Now is not the time to play secretary.
Don't ask stupid questions.
Before I transferred here, I was designated Cipher Nine. Tell Zamar Intelligence needs him.
I'm former Intelligence.
I heard her, Commander. Send her in.
I heard him, Commander. Send him in.
A rather small rescue party. Still, I'm grateful you found us quickly.
The report you compiled on our forces--do you have it?
I need something from you.
Yes. Why do I suspect you're not authorized to know about it?
I'm afraid that's not why I'm here. The war report--is it safe?
Sorry, I'm not your rescuer.
Ah, yes--what's the life of an old Moff next to his information?
If you want to get out of this, you need to tell me about the war report.
Listen up, for your own good.
Is that what the Republic is after? Top secret doesn't mean what it used to.
The report is complete, and it is safe--for the eyes of the Dark Council. You understand I can't say much more.
I need that data. Maybe the word "chromatic" means something to you.
I have a code word.
Not a thing, other than the obvious. You aren't really....
Very well. I owe him that much.
Your data may be the only undoctored accounting of Corellian forces. By the time it reaches the Ministry of War, someone will have altered it.
Here's the real truth...
I need your help to learn who's changing reports, and why.
Those are bold claims.
I've seen numbers altered before. Dark Lords who use troops for their own purposes and cover it up. Sith infighting disguised as glorious conquest....
If someone is taking advantage of that to rewrite our plans, you can have my report, and... yes?
We've spotted more Republic soldiers, sir.
You'll have whatever political and material support I can give once we reach safety. For now, can you lead us out of here?
I'll give you the report, but I'll need to alert the Dark Council as soon as we reach safety. Can you lead us out of here?
Stay behind me, and keep close to your escort. I can get you outside the building.
Come with me; I'll help you.
Commander?
We can make it to an outpost from there.
Then let's be on our way.
You'll have to hold out for reinforcements.
My mission is too urgent.
Understood. It never ends, does it? Imperials at odds with Imperials, never seeing the whole picture.
We'll fortify the choke point.
And you should leave, before it gets bloody.
I have a report to deliver. You need to take care of yourself.
Your health isn't my problem.
Very well. If needs must.
I'd spit on you, but I'll need my strength.
Commander? Start preparing your defense!
I respect your commitment to confidentiality.
Fair enough. [Kill him]
Kill her!
Kill him!
Don't worry. You can't protect him anyway.
He has what I need. [Attack]
Some days, you still surprise me. Better kill them all.
That wasn't necessary!
Sir! He was one of ours!
Now we don't have to worry about convincing Zamar....
Now targeting all Republic and Imperial troops.
You will go no further.
